name: attract
flavor_text: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
effect_text_extend: Causes the target to fall in love with the user, giving it a 50% chance to do nothing each turn.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.  If either Pok√©mon leaves the field, this effect ends.
effect_text_simple: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.
